author: Deo Dolormente
text: Guys, the guys are really good.. To all people who's looking for a good service, reasonable pricing, professionalism,  This shop is perfect for us. I'm kind of person that high standard in term of paint and detailing in my car but the guy satisfy me. Good job!

author: Martin Grove
text: Received Great service from these guys. I think if you are looking for HONEST mechanics ..these guys are it!.. brought by my mazda 3 for body work and they did an excellent job..THANK YOU!!

author: Joban
text: JSG Auto provided outstanding service, handling both bodywork and technical repairs with precision and professionalism. The team used advanced equipment, ensuring my car looks and runs like new. Their attention to detail and clear communication throughout the process made the experience seamless.

author: Laeeq Ahmed
text: The best body shop in Toronto. You can get quotes from anywhere and then give them a try. Their work is fast and exceptional. Employees are highly trained and skilled. Their turn around rate is pretty high too. You can get your car, in most cases, back in 2-3 days. They are open on Saturdays too and open till 7pm on weekdays. I highly recommend them.
